messages.subject: Re: Re: NE unschooling conference
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 4/27/2003 2:26:31 PM Eastern Standard Time, ... I just posted a question to that list....hopefully will be hearing soon. It looks like I ve
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 4/27/2003 2:26:31 PM Eastern Standard Time,
Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com writes:

> Wasn't there someone that sort of volunteered to take the lead in a possible
>
> NE conference. If you wanted to check that out and get back to the group
> about what you found that would be great. I am always up for a NE
> conference. That is where all my family is. (what family is left anyway).
>
> I would be willing to help as best I could from NC.
> Pam G.
>
> In a message dated 4/27/03 11:24:52 AM Eastern Daylight Time,
> liv2learn@... writes:
>
> >There was a small unschooling conference last year in Watertown, MA. (I
> >went, and also live in MA.)

I just posted a question to that list....hopefully will be hearing soon.

It looks like I've volunteered to coordinate this....my partner is actually
enthusiastic and has a bunch of ideas too.

Way cool!
Kathryn


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
